Sentencas: The high costs of fuel cell stacks are often prohibitive for research applications.
Titulo: Fuel Cell Stack Emulation for Cell and Hardware-in-the-Loop Testing

Sentencas: Instead, researchers tend to either perform tests on individual cells under emulated load conditions, or they use model-based emulated fuel cell stacks to test realistic loads.
Titulo: Fuel Cell Stack Emulation for Cell and Hardware-in-the-Loop Testing

Sentencas: This paper presents an alternative technique that allows the simultaneous investigation of both cell and hardware.
Titulo: Fuel Cell Stack Emulation for Cell and Hardware-in-the-Loop Testing

Sentencas: In this technique, an amplifier takes as input the voltage of a reference fuel cell and reproduces the scaled-up voltage that would be provided by a stack of similar cells.
Titulo: Fuel Cell Stack Emulation for Cell and Hardware-in-the-Loop Testing

Sentencas: The output terminals of this simulated stack can be connected to realistic loads, which are series connected with the reference cell to maintain a one-to-one correspondence of cell and load currents.
Titulo: Fuel Cell Stack Emulation for Cell and Hardware-in-the-Loop Testing

Sentencas: This technique allows the simultaneous investigation of stack/load interactions, stack electrochemical performance characteristics, and stack durability under load.
Titulo: Fuel Cell Stack Emulation for Cell and Hardware-in-the-Loop Testing

Sentencas: The amplifier electronics are independent of the fuel cell allowing its use with all fuel cell types, e.g., solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) or proton exchange membrane fuel cells.
Titulo: Fuel Cell Stack Emulation for Cell and Hardware-in-the-Loop Testing

Sentencas: We demonstrate the emulator using a single planar SOFC and under several real loads.
Titulo: Fuel Cell Stack Emulation for Cell and Hardware-in-the-Loop Testing

Sentencas: The data collected reveal good steady-state and dynamic accuracy, and the observed electrical interactions highlight the utility of the emulator in cell and hardware-in-the-loop testing.
Titulo: Fuel Cell Stack Emulation for Cell and Hardware-in-the-Loop Testing

Sentencas: Ultimately, this technique provides fuel cell system researchers and developers a low-cost, easily implemented tool for rapid assessment of novel fuel cell technologies under real-world loading conditions.
Titulo: Fuel Cell Stack Emulation for Cell and Hardware-in-the-Loop Testing
